English:
>... <color=red><size=200%>Hold your breath. </size></color>
>... Wait... there! It's clearing up.  
>... [coughing] Good. Let's move on!

French.Translation:
>... <color=red><size=200%>Retenez votre souffle.</size></color>
>... Attendez... Là ! Ça se dégage.
>... [toux] Parfait. Allons-y !

Italian.Translation:
>… <color=red><size=200%>Trattenete il respiro. </size></color>
>… Aspettate… Là! Si sta schiarendo. 
>… [tossendo] Bene. Muoviamoci!

German.Translation:
>… <color=red><size=200%>Haltet den Atem an. </size></color>
>… Moment … da! Es klärt sich auf.  
>… [hustet] Gut. Weiter!

Spanish.Translation:
>... <color=red><size=200%>Contén la respiración.</size></color>
> Un momento..., ¡ahí! Se está disipando. 
>... [tos] Bien. ¡Sigamos!

Russian.Translation:
>...<color=red><size=200%>Задержите дыхание. </size></color>
>...Стойте... Вон там! Дым уходит.
>...[кашель] Хорошо. Бежим!

Portuguese_Brazil.Translation:
>... <color=red><size=200%>Segurem a respiração. </size></color>
>... esperem... ali! Está limpando. 
>... [tossindo] Que bom! Vamos em frente!

Polish.Translation:
>... <color=red><size=200%>Wstrzymać oddech. </size></color>
>... Chwila... tam! Ustępuje.  
>... [kaszel] Dobra. W drogę!

Japanese.Translation:
>... <color=red><size=200%>息を止めろ。</size></color>
>... 待て... 見ろ！晴れてきたぞ。  
>... [咳払い] よし。先を急ぐぞ！

Korean.Translation:
>... <color=red><size=200%>숨을 참아. </size></color>
>... 잠깐... 저기 봐! 사라지고 있어.  
>... [기침] 좋아. 계속 가자!

Chinese_Traditional.Translation:
>... <color=red><size=200%>屏住呼吸。</size></color>
>... 等等……看！要消散了。
>... [咳嗽]很好。我們繼續！

Chinese_Simplified.Translation:
>... <color=red><size=200%>屏住呼吸。</size></color>
>... 等等……看！要消散了。
>... [咳嗽]很好。咱们继续！

name: RundownData.R8B4.RoleplayedWardenIntel
